ValidationRule.description: Only opportunities linked to Paychex Referral Network can have the lead source of Referral-Paychex Referral Network. If this was a Paychex Referral network lead please follow the verbal referral process to allow for payment.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Referral-Paychex Referral Network'),
OR($User.Job_Name__c='Sales Representative', $Profile.Name = 'MMS SDR', $User.Job_Name__c='District Sales Manager', CONTAINS($User.Job_Name__c, 'Sales Assistant') ),
AND(ISBLANK(ReferralLookup__r.Amplifinity_Referral__c), ISBLANK(amp_dev__Referral__c) ),
NOT(CONTAINS($RecordType.Name, 'Referral')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only opportunities linked to Paychex Referral Network can have the lead source of Referral-Paychex Referral Network. If this was a Paychex Referral network lead please follow the verbal referral process to allow for payment.
